Text1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Ah, I'm sorry. I didn't see you there.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>I've been preoccupied with the monsters
that have settled on <clr:0000>North Akkala Beach<clr:ffff>
below the cliff.
Thinking about what would happen if they
came up to the stable has me worried.

I can't even focus on my work...
Text1035:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh? Are you not registered with the
Stable Association yet?

If you use stables, then you should
absolutely be registered. That's how
you get a Pony Points card!
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Head on over to the counter to get set up,
then come back and talk to me.
Text1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>I've been trying to find someone to go
drive them off...
Text1036:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>In that case, I'll add two points for you
to show my thanks for your help with
those monsters.
Text1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Just how long are they going to stay there...


And they may have spotted us spying on them from
the cliff... What should I do if they come all the way
up here? <sp:5:0:0>Hm?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Text1037:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Let me just add two points for you to
show my thanks!
Text1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I've been trying to find someone to go
drive them off, but everyone I've asked
has refused to help.
It seems that kind of skill and confidence
is in short supply.

<sp:3:0:2:0300>Anyway,<sp:5:0:0> do you see the big tree
over there?
Text1038:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Are you all registered with the Stable
Association now?
Near1002: It's only a matter of time...
Text1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkPositive>If you look down over the cliff from there,
you can probably see the monsters.

It's an intimidating sight, to be sure.
Text1039:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh... Hang on... You're already carrying
a ton of <clr:0000>endura carrots<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Well, I still want to give you this. Just let
me know when you've got some room
for it!
Text1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Everyone keeps saying not to worry, that
they won't come all the way to the stable.<sp:5:0:0>
But I'm not so sure.
I don't think I'll really be able to relax
until those monsters are gone for good.
Text1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>We wouldn't stand a chance against
those monsters if they decided to attack
this stable.
Maybe I should look for a job somewhere
else? South Akkala Stable might have
some openings...
Text1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, are you back to collect your
<clr:0000>endura carrot <clr:ffff>from me?

Hmm. You still don't have any room.
Well, that's fine. Just come talk to me
when you've got some space!
Text1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, you've made some space? Then
here's the promised <clr:0000>endura carrot<clr:ffff>!
Text1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Ah, you're the traveler from earlier. Sorry,
I didn't notice you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm still preoccupied with the monsters
that have settled on <clr:0000>North Akkala Beach<clr:ffff>
below the cliff.
Thinking about what would happen if they
came up to the stable has me worried.

I can't even focus on my work...
Text1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What?! You defeated every last one
of them?

H-hold on a second!<sp:5:0:0> It's not that I don't
believe you, but I need to check for
myself. <sp:5:0:0>It's the only way I'll sleep at night.
Text1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseM_01>You weren't kidding!


I can't believe it! There were so many
monsters before, but now they're gone!
Text1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you want to see what I'm talking about,
you can take a look over the edge by
that tree.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I can't imagine why monsters would be
settling on <clr:0000>North Akkala Beach<clr:ffff> of all
places, and I can't stop worrying about it.
I thought maybe I could build a barricade
on the road down from the stable...

Who am I kidding though? If a group that
big decided to head this way, there would
be no stopping them.
Text1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Well, you're just amazing!


I'm sorry, I'm just so surprised.<sp:5:0:0> I mean,
you don't look all that strong...

But you've been such a huge help! I can
already feel the stress those monsters
caused leaving my body. Thank you!
Hey, that reminds me. Do you have a
Pony Points card?
Text1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Just how long are they going to stay there...


And this weather would make pretty good cover
for them to attack too. <sp:5:0:0>Hm?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Text1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>But everyone I've asked has lost their
nerve the moment they looked over the
edge and saw what they were up against.
Text1044: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>And I'd like to give you this too!
Text1034:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>They're supposedly a favorite of the horse
god, <clr:0000>Malanya<clr:ffff>. He lives a short distance
away from this stable, in fact.
I'd planned to ask him to help with the
monsters, and was going to give it to him
as a gift...
But now that the monsters have been
handled, I'll give it to you instead!

It's a really valuable carrot, and it doesn't
grow around here. Be careful not to
accidentally eat it!
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Anyway, I should get back to work.
Thanks for all your help!
